data.text: (א) Unto thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul.
O my God, (ב) I trust in thee: let me not be ashamed,
(ג) Yea, let none that wait on thee be ashamed:
(ד) Shew me thy ways, O Lord; Teach me thy paths.
(ה) Lead me in thy truth, and teach me:
(ז) Remember, O Lord, thy tender mercies and thy lovingkindnesses;
(ח) Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions:
(ט) Good and upright is the Lord:
(י) The meek will he guide in judgment:
(כ) All the paths of the Lord are mercy and truth
(ל) For thy name’s sake, O Lord,
(מ) What man is he that feareth the Lord?
(נ) His soul shall dwell at ease;
(ס) The secret of the Lord is with them that fear him;
(ע) Mine eyes are ever towards the Lord;
(פ) Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me;
(צ) The troubles of my heart are enlarged:
(ר) Look upon mine affliction and my pain;
(ר) Consider mine enemies; for they are many;
(ש) O keep my soul, and deliver me:
(ת) Let integrity and uprightness preserve me;
(פ) Redeem Israel, O God, out of all his troubles.
